price: 4. Ma jirto magaalo aan halaagnay oo aan lahayn waqti la yaqaan oo qoran.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
